text:

slive@apache.org
text:
Are you using any "Deny" directives in your config?  If Apache is forced
to lookup the hostname in order to match against a Deny directive,
it will also log the hostname.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
No further response from submitter. Assuming configuration issue pointed out by
Joshua.

Thanks for using Apache!
